Text: I would have sent a private message, but since I cant find that option I figured I would just post a comment here.  thanks a lot for all the playboy content you've uploaded.  will you take requests?  for instance the next time you upload a playboy plus picture set can we request a video from a particular woman?  i understand that upping all of them would take too much time.  so requests might be a bit more reasonable.  thanks again :D
Prior22> which one do you have in mind?

evelyn garcia
tania funes
Elena Romanova
ashley sasha

by the way is there some sort of way to send direct messages on here? posting requests in torrent threads is fine though if there isnt.  thanks again for the help :D
thanks a lot for the up.  from now on if there's any other playboy content i'm interested in seeing i'll just post the request in your latest torrent thread.
